name: Candy Shooters
description:
Release Date: 1/12/2019

Candy Shooters is a TopDownShooter made by Deep Studios.
The game is about shooting evil candies (they shoot back)
and trying to get the best score possible.
Candy Sticks drop items you can pickup to get an advantage.
Have fun and good luck!
